query.statement:
SELECT EP01.LIFNR ,EP01.LAND1 ,EP01.LGORT ,EP01.WAERS ,EP01.REPRES ,EP01.PERNR ,EP01.ABR_NM AS NAME1 ,KNA1.J_1KFREPRE ,KNA1.STRAS ,KNA1.TELF1 ,KNA1.TELFX ,EP01.TERMSOFTRADE ,EP01.SHIPTO ,EP01.LAND1_NM ,EP01.TERMSOFPAYMENT ,EP01.ZTERM_CODE ,EP01.ZTERM_TEXT ,EP01.TO_1 ,EP01.TO_2 ,EP01.TO_3 ,EP01.TO_4 ,EP01.TO_5 ,EP01.INCGBN ,EP01.INCGBN_TX FROM SAPHEE.ZCSTEP01 AS EP01 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.KNA1 AS KNA1 ON KNA1.MANDT = EP01.MANDT AND KNA1.KUNNR = EP01.LIFNR
WHERE EP01.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND EP01.LAND1 != ''
AND EP01.INCGBN = #INCGBN#
AND EP01.LAND1 = #LAND1#
AND EP01.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND EP01.LIFNR LIKE '%'||#KUNNR#||'%'
WITH UR
